dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1350 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 442 East 167th Street in Bronx, New York, as the “Herman Badillo Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 442 East 167th Street in Bronx, New York, as the Herman Badillo Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 442 East 167th Street in Bronx, New York, shall be known and designated as the Herman Badillo Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Herman Badillo Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 15, 2015.
